title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Education
body: To the Moon....and Beyond!  Craters of the Moon is an out of this world outdoor classroom! Plan a field trip or link to curriculum materials that can be used at school.   Discover lesson plans and field trip information to utilize Craters as your classroom. Look to the park for your own professional development needs. And explore your backyard and reach for the stars by Visiting the Moon - WithoutÂ Leaving Idaho.                  Make a trip to the Moon Access information to plan and reserve a field trip to the park. Includes suggested itineraries and field trip guides. Read More        Bring Craters to your classroom Access lesson plans to bring Craters of the Moon to your classroom. Includes field trip and a variety of classroom activities. Read More        Professional Development Learn more about college level Educator's workshops and other professional development opportunities available for teachers. Read More
